articles.description: Having seen the franchises suffer due to late pullouts, the BCCI is reportedly looking to devise a policy. The move is an attempt to discourage unwarranted withdrawals from players. Ahead of the IPL 2022 season, Jason Roy and Alex Hales had pulled out citing …

articles.author: ESPN
articles.title: World Cup: Who has qualified and who is still in contention? - ESPN India
articles.description: World Cup qualifying has entered its final stretch, with 27 of the 32 finalists now known. Here's who's still in contention.
articles.content:
World Cup qualifying has entered its final stretch, with 27 of the 32 finalists now known.
But who could take the five places that remain? We take a closer look.
